QuestData.Title: Leave Nothing Behind!
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlord clan has become a thorn in my side I will no longer tolerate.$b$bGo east and leave none alive! Burn their supplies! Leave them nothing to cling to.$b$bConverge on the Savage Crag to the east when it is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Kur'ak the Binder, burn the Thunderlord Supplies, and destroy the Thunderlord Ballistae.
QuestData.RewardText: Hrmph. The burning smell of Thunderlord. This pleases me, $c.
